wikipedia_page.main:
Christopher Bramwell is a British actor who was active on television from 1977 until 1996.
He appeared in several TV dramas including Grange Hill, Enemy at the Door, Tales of the Unexpected, The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (in a brief appearance as the adult Peter Pevensie) and Van der Valk. He was also a presenter on Playschool in the early 1980s. His most recent television appearance was in This Life.

The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (1988 TV serial)

response: God Rot Tunbridge Wells! is a 1985 British musical television film directed by Tony Palmer, written by John Osborne and starring Trevor Howard, Christopher Bramwell and Dave Griffiths.BFI.org It was aired on Channel 4 in 1985 and was made to mark the 300th anniversary of Handel's birth.
